title: 有個發射器的插件可以請知道的提供一下線索嗎....?
author: a0951251
txt_content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzOGWaimpW4

請問有人知到影片中的這個插件嗎0.0 

我在網路上找到他很多相關文章

但都沒有相關的下載或是教學

他可以讓發射器 發射出來的東西實體化 不會變回物品

例如說放礦車他會跑出礦車 不會變成"礦車物品方塊"

放水會變成水流 不會變成水流方塊

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
他只提供了源码 没有弄成jar格式要么就是没上传

Tonight I hacked together the bukkit-dispenser mod for Bukkit. It adds a number of features to the dispenser block which I have been wishing it had since it first appeared.

评论：
Could you perhaps provide a compiled jar? Maybe even put it on the Bukkit plugin site? I'd really like to use this as the only other plugin that I saw on the plugin site that did this was﻿ inactive.
Striker6879 3 weeks ago 
可以提供jar下载么？ 弄到bukkit官网吧

replies.author: a0951251
replies.txt_content:
